
>) Eat another donut
2) Get off the couch

You eat another donut.

1) Ok, is it fine?
>) Ok, it's fine!

Ok, it's fine!

>) Eat another donut
2) Get off the couch

You eat another donut.

>) Ok, is it fine?

Ok, is it fine?

1) Eat another donut
>) Get off the couch

You struggle up off the couch to go and compose epic poetry.
